name: Move Pick n' Jump
description:
Controls

W A S D or Up Down Left Right to move the player

Space to jump

Press space when against a wall whilst airborne to wall jump

Click and hold on a purple block to pick up object and release to drop

How does your submission match the theme?

Picking up purple blocks allows the player to stack to climb, the player can wall jump off of any surface including stacked blocks to reach higher surfaces.

Third-party resources

Unity 5.6.2f1 (64-bit)

MagicaVoxel
